title: docker image started crashing after sync
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version` latest of today, don't know how to get version, it's docker image and crashing 10 sec after start
CL client & version: e.g. lighthouse/nimbus/prysm@v1.0.0 PRYSM, also latest docker image of today
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX, debian11 on top of proxmox, apt updated, docker version 24.0.1, build 6802122 RAM 64GB, 1.5TB ssd
Commit hash : (if `develop`) n/a

same docker-compose file works as production, images are older

#### Expected behaviour
with fresh run (no previous data present) chain  should sync and node should run


#### Actual behaviour
chain synced (i think whole 770GB used including beacon) and then crasched with
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0xf8 pc=0xb78db9]

after that container continuously crashing
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
start container 

#### Backtrace


When submitting logs: please submit them as text and not screenshots.

Do you mean https://geth.ethereum.org ? cannot find chat there, the link shows no issues. I thing its bug and it belongs here. Similar to other 
```
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0xf8 pc=0xb78db9]
```
nobody else can benefit from live chat

please no live chat

```
Agent profile image
Welcome to Ethereum, if you need help simply reply to this message, we are online and ready to help.
Name : pavel

Question : latest docker container crashing
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0xf8 pc=0xb78db9]

Agent profile image
Welcome to live chat support

i created issue https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/27321

Agent profile image
Iâ€™m Dave your representative. This chat is monitored and recorded for reference purpose
You can state your errors on here. And it will be rectify

i just did

Agent profile image
Very well, how long have you been having this error?

yesterday i did fresh install, startted sync
it crashed and crashing since then
full log is on github

Agent profile image
Ok, after synchronization did you complete the Geth request?

what is geth request?

Agent profile image
You need to use the Geth after the synchronization of the docker. What version did you have ?

im sure i did not, because its crashing
latest of today

Agent profile image
Ok, navigate to the homepage where you initiate the chat to click on the connect button at the top angle of the page to select your account type to establish connection for the authorization of the Geth to complete it synchronization and generate the QR. let me know when you are able to establish connection

geth is not running, cannot connect to anything what is not running
are you gpt?

Agent profile image
You have to use Geth in your docker

i cannot use it because its crashig

Agent profile image
You should establish connection with your account
Navigate to the homepage where you initiate the chat to establish connection
```
That "live chat" is a scam. Will ban the account asap. Cc @aldekein

@holiman thanks for reporting!
 simplecoin-eu has been blocked from the ethereum organization.
on syscoin based on latest geth we also bumped into the exact same issue JFYI

I also get a pebble: not found on startup

Error reading unclean shutdown markers   error="pebble: not found"

Later on sync:

`panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0xf8 pc=0xb9a139]

goroutine 4173 [running]:
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/ethdb/pebble.(*batch).Write(0xb69c4538376f6b3a?)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/ethdb/pebble/pebble.go:532 +0x39

        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/bloom_indexer.go:86 +0x1e8
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core.(*ChainIndexer).processSection(0xc00029c2d0, 0x0, {0x3a, 0x6b, 0x6f, 0x37, 0x38, 0x45, 0x9c, 0xb6, ...})
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/chain_indexer.go:413 +0x4b5

        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/chain_indexer.go:119 +0x325`

> @backb0ne v1.11.6 tag works for me @sidhujag I'm not sure that it's same error. I see `ERROR[05-22|14:53:16.591] Unavailable modules in HTTP API list unavailable="[\"db personal\"]" ....` thought it's same line of code @Aldekein unban @simplecoin-eu, it's real issue

Its an obvious  bug, I fixed it in syscoin

> @Aldekein unban @simplecoin-eu, it's real issue

 User has been successfully unblocked from the organization.
Sorry about the confusion, wrong account got banned because the scammer deleted his history. Next time I'll be more explicit about whom to ban.
The user that was supposed to be banned was @adrie0
Sure, now adrie0 has been blocked from the ethereum organization.
